attributes.action: Stop treating the UK Electorate as idiots.
attributes.additional_details:
You created a fuel crisis where there is none.
You lined your treasury coffers with the cash for access scandal.
You have punished local traders for serving hard working British people hot food to keep them going through the cold winters.
You have punished the elderly, many of whom have worked since the age of 14 and paid tax and national insurance all their lives, by clawing back the meagre tax concessions that they had.
You have ensured that the more well off citizens amongst us get the tax relief they want.
Since you have been in office, you have continually lied to us. Please treat the electorate as intelligent.
